# Introduction


This book contains the topics Dr. D.M. Luchtenburg teaches in ME424 Advanced Dynamics course at The Cooper Union. It was initially written in 2023 summer with the aid of his former students Alsu Flare (Class of 2023) and Eunkyu Kim (Class of 2023). 

The topics covered are
```{latex}
Kinematics: the description of motion
Rotation Matrices and Moving Frame Method (MFM)
Principles of Virtual Work
Euler Lagriangian Formulation
Lagrangian Multiplers
```

The book also contains several simple examples with both analytical and python-based numerical solutions.
